learning_content_text: The lecturer is able to convey the teaching content in an understandable way.
atmosphere_text: The atmosphere in the lecture is pleasant and friendly.
participation_text: The lecturer involves the students in the presentation.
grading_text: The grading is done in a fair and transparent manner.
availability_text: The lecturer is sufficiently available to the students.
recommendation_text: I would recommend this presenter to others.
